prompts: Create a dual-type Pokemon that combines plant and poison characteristics with vibrant flowers.
I want to see a large, quadrupedal Pokemon that has a thick body and a huge flower on its back.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with blue skin and a green plant-like feature on its back.
Make a Pokemon design that features a large, bulbous plant and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in lush forests and uses plant-based attacks in battles.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body, sturdy limbs, and colorful floral accents.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both strength and a connection to nature, with vivid colors.
